#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int p[10002];
int main() {
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
		int f,w,h,i,j;
		cin >> f >> h >> w;
		for(i = 0 ; i < f ; i++) cin >> p[i];
		sort(p,p+f);
		j = p[0];
		for(i = 1 ;i < f ; i++) j = min(p[i]-p[i-1],j);
		j = min(j,w-p[f-1]);
		cout << j*h << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
